name: addallowence
description: You can add other people to be able to add entries!

options.name: leaderboardid
options.description: To what leaderboard shall the user be added?

options.name: user
options.description: Who shall be able to interact with your leaderboard?

name: allleaderboards
description: posts all leaderboards that were created on this discord server

name: removeallowence
description: You can remove other people to be able to add entries!

options.name: leaderboardid
options.description: To what leaderboard shall the user be removed?

options.name: user
options.description: Who shall not be able to interact with your leaderboard anymore?

name: cloneleaderboard
description: Creates a Leaderboardmessage for your Channel

options.name: leaderboardid
options.description: The ID of the leaderboard that shall be cloned

options.name: allentries
options.description: Do you want to see all entries instead of the best per Driver?

options.name: leaderboardid
options.description: Id of the Leaderboard that shall be deleted

name: myleaderboards
description: DMs you all leaderboards where you are a entry.
